modName: Bamboo Backed Hickory Bow and Wooden Backed Bow
summary: This mod has two bows, Bamboo Backed Hickory Bow, a bow made from a sheet of bamboo and reinforced with Hickory wood, and Wooden Backed Bow is a bow made from a sheet of wood and reinforced with more wood.
descriptionHtml:
This mod has two bows, Bamboo Backed Hickory Bow, a bow made from a sheet of bamboo and reinforced with Hickory wood, and Wooden Backed Bow is a bow made from a sheet of wood and reinforced with more wood.

1- Bamboo Backed Hickory Bow:
This file replaces lavender plants for bamboo plants , they retain the same chemical properties so if someone used the lavender for some potion can use the bamboo now, unless someone used the lavender to bring it behind the ear.
The bamboo will be necessary to make the bow.
Bamboo plants can be found it in all Tamriel , even within counties or can buy it at any merchant.
IMPORTANT: This mod is not compatible with any other mod that uses the plant or ingredient lavender.
IMPORTANT: Make a backup of your previous saved games.

2- Wooden Backed Bow:
It is a wooden bow reinforced with wood, compatible with any other mod or dlc, not replace any files from the original game.

Both bows can be crafted in the forge in the Wooden category.

Installation : I recommend using NMM.
Uninstalling : I recommend using NMM.
author: Alrock10
